everydesc.minecraft:obsidian: When at least 10 blocks of Obsidian are placed in a frame-like shape and the inside is lit with fire, a portal to another dimension is opened...
everydesc.minecraft:ender_pearl: Marble-like pearls that can be throw to teleport you, dealing some damage in the process. I wonder if they could be used for interdimensional travel, given the right fuel source?
everydesc.minecraft:ender_eye: When thrown, the Eyes of Ender will seek out the long forgotten Strongholds. They have a chance to break when thrown, and 12 are required to finish what was started long ago, so be sure to stock up on them.
